page.title: 10CAROLINE'S DAY AT KNEESALL
page.content: On Sunday night I go to bed at 9.00 o'clock. I wake up in the morning at about five minutes to eight. I don't have any breakfast.At a quarter to nine I set off to go to my new school.I have just come to live in the village of Kneesall.At five minutes to nine school starts.Sometimes I do Maths before play.After play we write a story or see a television programme At dinner time I have a hot meal, and then go to play outside if it is fine. After dinner we sometimes do art.After play we have a story or we read. At 3.25 we go home.When I'm home if it's a nice day I play outside, sometimes with my older sister otherwise I watch television.Each night I go to bed at 9.00 o'clock ready for another day at school.This is a day in my life.
